oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme and his family have seen and understand different people in their country. Tamme understands the languages spoken by the Ovambo, the Ovaherero and the Namaqua. 1) See also Different peoples and Bushmen in !nanni and Tamme's country, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tamme's family and their understanding of the languages spoken in their country
